name: NeoIPC BSI Infection date
description: The day the first infection symptoms appeared.

name: NeoIPC BSI Antibiotic treatment
formName: Treatment with five or more days of intravenous antibiotics was initiated:

name: NeoIPC BSI Temperature
formName: Temperature instability or fever ( >38°C), or hypothermia (<36.5°C)
description: Temperature instability or fever ( >38°C), or hypothermia (<36,5°C)

name: NeoIPC BSI No positive culture
description: Check this box it there was no positive microbiological blood and/or cerebrospinal fluid culture during this sepsis episode. This also applies when no sample was taken or when tha sample could not be processed in the lab.

name: NeoIPC BSI Bradycardia
formName: Increased bradycardia ( < 80l/min) or new onset resting tachycardia (>200/min).
description: Increased bradycardia ( < 80l/min) or new onset resting tachycardia (>200/min).

name: NeoIPC BSI Perfusion
formName: Capillary refill time of > 3s or skin mottling or core/peripheral temperature gap > 2°C
description: Capillary refill time of > 3s or skin mottling or core/peripheral temperature gap > 2°C

name: NeoIPC BSI Apnoea
formName: New/more frequent apnoea (>20s) or increase in oxygen requirement or ventilator support
description: New/more frequent apnoea (>20s) or increase in oxygen requirement or ventilator support

name: NeoIPC BSI Feeding intolerance
formName: Ileus or enteral feeds intolerance or abdominal distension

name: NeoIPC BSI Irritability
formName: Irritability, lethargy, apathy or unstable condition

name: NeoIPC BSI White blood cell count
description: A White blood cell count(WBC) < 4 × 10^9/L or > 20 × 10^9/L

name: NeoIPC BSI I/T ratio
formName: I/T ratio of neutrophil blood cells > 0.2
description: I/T ratio of neutrophil blood cells > 0.2
